segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool first, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to get those cookies, and the stool looks so wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing next to him, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit worried for them, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could tip any second, and the floor is getting slippery with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, still drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are taking advantage of her distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't blame them, those cookies look really tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't get hurt in the process.
segments.speaker: PAR
